```{r setup}
devtools::install_github("jt-hicks/malsimgen")
devtools::install_github("jt-hicks/mamasante")
library(mamasante)
library(malsimgen)
sim_data <- malsimgen::data_gen(volatility=1,
                                init_EIR=100,
                                min_EIR=0.01,
                                max_EIR=500,
                                plot_instance=TRUE)
```
